Class PinyinBaseUnit

java.lang.Object

public class PinyinBaseUnit
extends java.lang.Object

As a single Pinyin units for example: "hao" ===>mOriginalString="hao"; mPinyin="hao";mNumber="426"; "???hao" ===>mOriginalString="???hao"; mPinyin="???hao";mNumber="???426"; "周" ===>mOriginalString="周"; mPinyin="zhou";mNumber="9468";
